problem_text_en: Given Z is the midpoint of VX. Z is the midpoint of WY and VX . Complete the proof that XY∥VW . (Elements:  YZ ,  ∠XYZ ,  ∠XZY ,  ∠VZW ,  △VWZ ,  VZ ,  ∠VWZ ,  WZ ,  XY ,  XZ ,  △XYZ ,  VW , )
raw_statement: Z is the midpoint of WY
Z is the midpoint of VX
raw_reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
